comments.raw_text: We still add some locations manually, and it's slow to open the Products dropdown, scroll past all the products we've ever used, and get to the bottom and locate the product you want to select. If the list were sorted so that the most recent products were first that would be a big improvement. Might just be adding a descending sort on the query.
comments.creator: nrthomas@gmail.com
